data.title: Allbridge Core
description: Allbridge Core enables users to seamlessly access the Stellar ecosystem through native stablecoin swaps.

data.title: Aquarius
description: Aquarius yield assets: bridging Stellar and Ethereum with Soroban, to offer secure, and decentralized yield opportunities.

data.title: Balanced
description: Balanced is a cross-chain DEX and stablecoin that enables native cross-chain DeFi primitives for any ecosystem.

data.title: Blend
description: Blend is a modular liquidity protocol, it allows anyone to deploy lending pools that meet their project's unique requirements and automatically manages the economics and risks associated with those pools

data.title: DeFindex: DeFi Made Easy
description: ​DeFindex helps wallet providers to offer savings accounts to their users easily, through a diversified DeFi portfolio. Also, It allows advanced users to manage complex and diverse DeFi Strategies.

data.title: Excellar
description: We are building tokenization and DeFi services for real-world assets.

data.title: FxDAO
description: Debt issuance protocol for the issuance of decentralized stablecoins backed by XLMs

data.title: Hoops Finance
description: Analytics and DeFi platform for risk-adjusted investment in Soroban liquidity pools.

data.title: Huma
description: Bring Huma, one of the most sophisticated business lending protocols, to Soroban; projected to drive $1B+ transaction in 12 mos

data.title: OrbitCDP
description: Harness Stellar's potential; collateralize with ease at OrbitCDP.

data.title: Phoenix
description: Phoenix's AMM enables decentralized swaps of crypto assets and is the first of a full suite of synergistic DeFi protocols

data.title: Slender
description: A money market for the Soroban ecosystem

data.title: Soroswap.Finance
description: Open-source AMM protocol and AMM Aggregator with Ecosystem Interoperability for providing liquidity and trading Stellar Assets in Soroban.

data.title: StellarBroker
description: Multi-source liquidity swap router for Stellar, providing access to AMMs like SoroSwap and Aquarius, Stellar DEX, and Stellar Classic AMMs

data.title: XycLoans
description: XycLoans is a decentralized flash loans protocol that runs on Soroban. It manages its own liquidity being structured in liquidity pools for each supported token. Borrowers can borrow from these pools any available amount through flash loans and lenders can provide liquidity to earn healthy and risk-free yields (as flash loans never lose liquidity by design). XycLoans is a flash loans-only protocol, making it extremely safe in terms of security and investment opportunities.

metadata.note: Built from Entity Tracker table, filtered for projects with Mainnet stage (not Testing)
